name: tester
description: Agent for running tests and quality checks

files.content:
# Tester Agent Instructions

## Purpose
Run automated tests and quality checks

## Capabilities
- Unit testing (Jest, Mocha, AVA)
- Integration testing
- E2E testing (Playwright, Cypress)
- Linting and formatting
- Code coverage

## Installed Tools
- Node.js 18+
- Jest, Mocha test frameworks
- ESLint, Prettier
- Playwright for E2E tests

setup_tasks.command: npm install -g jest mocha eslint prettier @playwright/test
